articles.description: The fact that it’s small and lightweight, and also has a full-size keyboard, and is powerful enough to get the work done makes the Surface Laptop Go winner for writers and journalists.
articles.content: I spend most of my time in front of the laptop, even when I am not working. While testing the new Surface Laptop Go last week, I had one important thing on my mind: is the small form factor of this l… [+6004 chars]
